name: Yamask

evolution.description: Yamask can evolve into Cofagrigus at level 9 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 10 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Spirit Pokémon. These Pokémon arose from the spirits of people interred in graves in past ages. Each retains memories of its former life.

abilities.name: Mummy
abilities.description: When this Pokémon is hit by a melee attack, one random ability of its attacker changes to Mummy for the remainder of the encounter.
